act_info.full_title: Hawkins Gignac Act (Carbon Monoxide Safety), 2013, S.O. 2013, c. 14
act_info.citation: Hawkins Gignac Act (Carbon Monoxide Safety), 2013, S.O. 2013, c. 14

content.content:
1. The week beginning on November 1 in each year is proclaimed as Carbon Monoxide Awareness Week. 2013, c. 14, s. 1. 2.-5. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation).
2013, c. 14, ss. 2-5. 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2013, c. 14, s. 6. 7. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2013, c. 14, s. 7. ______________   Français
content.raw_html:
1. The week beginning on November 1 in each year is proclaimed as Carbon Monoxide Awareness Week. 2013, c. 14, s. 1.

2.-5. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation). 2013, c. 14, ss. 2-5.

6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2013, c. 14, s. 6.

7. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2013, c. 14, s. 7.

______________
